author: Rebecca Klar
title: Pulitzer Prizes delayed two weeks due to coronavirus
description: The Pulitzer Prize Board has postponed the announcement of this year's award winners in order to have additional time to evaluate finalists due to ongoing coverage of the coronavirus pandemic, the board announced Tu...
content:
The Pulitzer Prize Board has postponed the announcement of this years award winners in order to have additional time to evaluate finalists due to ongoing coverage of the coronavirus pandemic, the board announced Tuesday. 
Winners for prizes in journalism, bo… [+1520 chars]
